duties_responsibilities.duty: Develops programs and course level curricula for the online/hybrid instructional environment.
Works closely with faculty on course design, online pedagogy, and effective adoption of instructional technologies.
Reviewing, updating, and implementing quality assurance plans for online/hybrid environment courses.
Facilitates the integration of instructional software into course content and designs learning objects and multimedia support materials.
Provides daily support and trains faculty and staff in using the Learning Management System (LMS) and instructional technologies.
Interacts with SMEs and faculty in the face-to-face format during normal business hours 5 days a week.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in education, instructional design, or a closely related field is required, master’s degree is preferred plus at least three years of experience in the field.
